record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3547
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3547 -- (House of Representatives - November 01, 2007)

[Page: H12397]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I would like to seek unanimous consent to withdraw as a sponsor on H.R. 3547.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Tennessee?
